"Photon Blasts":
"A Photon Blast is a powerful action that you can activate when your Photon Blast gauge is full.

Your gauge fills by taking actions in battle, such as hitting enemies with attacks. Once you have used a Photon Blast, you cannot use another one until a set amount of time has passed."

"The Photon Blast changes depending on the Weapon equipped.

Likewise, you cannot use a different Photon Blast of another Weapon if it's part of a Multi-weapon."

"You can set your Photon Blast to the Subpalette by selecting \"Equipment/Palette\" from the Main Menu, then selecting \"Subpalette\".

When the Photon Blast gauge fills during battle, use <%SubPaletteLeft> and <%SubPaletteRight> to position the Subpalette cursor on the Photon Blast icon, then use <%SubPalette> to activate it.
If playing with a keyboard, you can use the number keys to activate Subpalette slots directly."
